nodes.text: Devron Zal was Chief Contractor Liaison for Radell Mining Corporation, he was in charge of hiring temporary and contract employees. He joined Radell at an early age as a prodigy, and rocketed to his position as Chief Contractor Liaison. Devron was a handsome young man with a warm handshake and an impish grin and was smooth, confident, and polished. He was an extremely good dresser who used lots of cologne and hair lotion.
